knimeNode.name: Document Viewer
knimeNode.shortDescription: Shows a detailed view of the input documents and all their data, such as title, text, authors, meta information etc.

fullDescription.intro:
The first view shows a list of all document titles. A double click on a title opens an additional window, showing the details of the selected document. All the information of the document are shown, such as, title, text, journal title, author names, publication date, file name, category, source and type.
Additionally words can ce searched in that view and matches will be hilited. Tagged terms can be hilited as well.
fullDescription.option: Specifies the document column containing the documents to show.
